name: Ammo Pigs: Armed and Delicious
description: It's the year 2049. Slaughterhouse A.I. controls the surface of the Earth, turning all life into sausage. Only the pigs remain to fight.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3, 64-bit Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3, 64-bit Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Storage: 200 MB available space
